question:
Which of the following is correct?
1. Shore temple of  Pallavas             Mahabalipuram
2. Kailasa temple of  Rashtrakutas    Ellora
3. Khajuraho temples                      Chandellas
explanation:
Shore Temple is a complex of elegant shrines among a number of Hindu monuments at Mamallapuram .It is on the Coromandel Coast of Tamil Nadu state.
The Kailasha temple is the largest monolithic rock-cut temple in the world. It is located in the Ellora Caves, Maharashtra.
The Khajuraho Group of Monuments is a group of Hindu temples and Jain temples in Chhatarpur district, Madhya Pradesh. The temples of Khajuraho were commissioned by the Rajput rulers of Chandella Dynasty.
